official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to provide that motor carriers safety permits for the transportation of hazardous material be subject to annual renewal.

summary.text: Amends Federal transportation law to require that motor carrier safety permits for the transportation of hazardous materials be subject to annual renewal.

titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to provide that motor carriers safety permits for the transportation of hazardous material be subject to annual renewal.
